Row.Text: Adds better ribbon information to the game. Includes the following data: [N] [LIST] [LI] [B]• Production[/B] [LI] [B]• Citizens[/B] [LI] [B]• Combat Power[/B] [LI] [B]• Food[/B] [/LIST] [N] This is a single mod which includes 3 of izica's mods: [LIST] [LI] [B]• Player production[/B] [LI] [B]• Player population / citizens[/B] [LI] [B]• Player combat power[/B] [/LIST] [N] This mod does not affect saved games. [N] [B]URL:[/B] [URL]https://github.com/RoLYroLLs/Better-Ribbon-Info[/URL]
izica's mods: [N] [LIST] [LI] [B]• Player production[/B] [LI] [B]• Player population / citizens[/B] [LI] [B]• Player combat power[/B] [/LIST]
This should be compatible with all other mods.
